SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into area_data (province_Name, province_Short_Name, country, confirmed_Count, suspected_Count, cured_Count, dead_Count, location_Id, update_Time, current_Confirmed_Count, new_Confirmed_Count, sure_Nzd_Cnt) values (#{provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceShortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{confirmedCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{suspectedCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{curedCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deadCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{currentConfirmedCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{newConfirmedCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sureNzdCnt,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, province_Name, province_Short_Name, country, confirmed_Count, suspected_Count, cured_Count, dead_Count, location_Id, update_Time, current_Confirmed_Count, new_Confirmed_Count, sure_Nzd_Cnt from area_data

select id, province_Name, province_Short_Name, country, confirmed_Count, suspected_Count, cured_Count, dead_Count, location_Id, update_Time, current_Confirmed_Count, new_Confirmed_Count, sure_Nzd_Cnt from area_data where DATE_FORMAT(update_Time,'%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d') and province_Short_Name in
#{province.provinceShortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select.foreach: (select id, province_Name, province_Short_Name, country, confirmed_Count, suspected_Count, cured_Count, dead_Count, location_Id, update_Time, current_Confirmed_Count, new_Confirmed_Count, sure_Nzd_Cnt from area_data where province_Short_Name=#{item.provinceShortName} order by update_Time desc limit 1)

mapper.insert:
insert into area_data (id,province_Name, province_Short_Name, country, confirmed_Count, suspected_Count, cured_Count, dead_Count, location_Id, update_Time, current_Confirmed_Count, new_Confirmed_Count, sure_Nzd_Cnt) values
(#{areaData.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaData.provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaData.provinceShortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaData.country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaData.confirmedCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaData.suspectedCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaData.curedCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaData.deadCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaData.locationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{areaData.updateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{areaData.currentConfirmedCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaData.newConfirmedCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaData.sureNzdCnt,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
